original: “Cattārimāni, bhikkhave, appāni ceva sulabhāni ca, tāni ca anavajjāni.
analyzed: ▁cattāri m āni ▁bhikkhave ▁app āni ▁ceva ▁su la bh āni ▁ca ▁tāni ▁ca ▁anavajj āni

original: Paṁsukūlaṁ, bhikkhave, cīvarānaṁ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṁ.
analyzed: ▁paṃsukūl aṃ ▁bhikkhave ▁cīvar ānaṃ ▁app añca ▁su la bh añca ▁tañca ▁anavajj aṃ

original: Piṇḍiyālopo, bhikkhave, bhojanānaṁ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṁ.
analyzed: ▁ pi ṇḍ iyā lop o ▁bhikkhave ▁bhojan ānaṃ ▁app añca ▁su la bh añca ▁tañca ▁anavajj aṃ

original: Rukkhamūlaṁ, bhikkhave, senāsanānaṁ appañca sulabhañca, tañca anavajjaṁ.
analyzed: ▁rukkhamūl aṃ ▁bhikkhave ▁senāsan ānaṃ ▁app añca ▁su la bh añca ▁tañca ▁anavajj aṃ

original: Pūtimuttaṁ, bhikkhave, bhesajjānaṁ appañca sulabhañca tañca anavajjaṁ.
analyzed: ▁p ūti mutt aṃ ▁bhikkhave ▁bhesajj ānaṃ ▁app añca ▁su la bh añca ▁tañca ▁anavajj aṃ

original: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri appāni ceva sulabhāni ca, tāni ca anavajjāni.
Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu appena ca tuṭṭho hoti sulabhena ca anavajjena ca, idamassāhaṁ aññataraṁ sāmaññaṅganti vadāmī”ti.

original: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
